paragraphs: This small chime protected Ujirra, adept of the Ziz Kurah, from the merciless attack of a dro-m'Athra that killed all others at her adeptorium. By her rhythmic tapping of the chime, Ujirra composed a hymn to Jone and Jode that kept her safe through that horrible night. The hymn was unfortunately lost, but the chime survived.
The college restricts the use of this chime out of respect to our Khajiit compatriots.
